original_text: You shall be careful to do what has passed your lips, for you have voluntarily vowed to the Lord your God what you have promised with your mouth.
korean_text: 네 입으로 말한 것은 그대로 실행하도록 유의하라 무릇 자원한 예물은 네 하나님 여호와께 네가 서원하여 입으로 언약한 대로 행할지니라

sentences.original_text: You shall be careful to do what has passed your lips
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 네 입술에서 나온 것을 행하기를 조심해야 하며

sentences.original_text: for you have voluntarily vowed to the Lord your God
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 네 하나님 여호와께 자원하여 맹세하였으니

sentences.original_text: what you have promised with your mouth.
